snippet: Every muscle of Sattan Muanglek's body glistened as he was rubbed down by his trainer with liniment, its herbal odor permeating the dank corridors of Bangkok's legendary Lumpinee Boxing Stadium before a historic fight....

headline.print_headline: Bell Tolls for Legendary Thai Boxing Stadium
headline.main: Bell Tolls for Legendary Thai Boxing Stadium

lead_paragraph: Every muscle of Sattan Muanglek's body glistened as he was rubbed down by his trainer with liniment, its herbal odor permeating the dank corridors of Bangkok's legendary Lumpinee Boxing Stadium before a historic fight.
